entry.name: toggleClass
entry.title: .toggleClass()
entry.desc: Add or remove one or more classes from each element in the set of matched elements, depending on either the class's presence or the value of the switch argument, while animating all style changes.

argument.name: className
argument.desc: One or more class names (space separated) to be toggled for each element in the matched set.

argument.name: switch
argument.desc: A boolean value to determine whether the class should be added or removed.

example.desc: Toggles the class "big-blue" for the matched elements.
